meanings.definition: The stimuli that occur between two other stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The interstimuli in the experiment were the sounds played between the visual cues.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the interstimuli to understand their impact on perception.
meanings.sent3: The interstimuli decided to have a party while the main stimuli were busy.
meanings.sent4: The interstimuli acted like secret messengers passing information between the other stimuli.
meanings.sent5: The interstimuli danced around, making the experiment more lively.
